#summary Utility Usage
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

Use the following parameters to configure the utility.


= Details =

USAGE: ./dvdencode -i SOURCE -f FORMAT [OPTIONS]

  -i, --input PATH      The directory to search for DVD files.
  -f, --format TYPE     The format of the output files. (avi,mp4,ogm,mkv)

Handbrake CLI Options-------------------------------------------------

  -e, --encoder TYPE            The encoding type to use.
          (ffmpeg,xvid,x264,theora) (Default: ffmpeg).
  -q, --quality <decimal>       The quality (0.0 to 1.0). (Default 1.0).
  -2, --two-pass                Enable two-pass mode.
  -C, --cpu                     The number of CPUs to use (Default: autodetect).


Wrapper Options-------------------------------------------------------

  -o, --output PATH     The directory to save output files to
                        (Default: Location of DVD Files).
  --pause TIME          The time to pause encoding (HHMM).
  --resume TIME         The time to resume encoding (HHMM).
  --hcli <string>       The location of Handbrake CLI
                        (Default: C:\Program Files\Handbrake\HandBrakeCLI.exe).
  -R                    Recursively go through each folder looking for DVDs.
  -D                    Delete the original DVD files upon successful encoding.
  -h                    Prints this usage information.
